ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) loaf Calabrese bread (crusty Italian bread), cut into 1/2-inch slices
salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste
salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Infuse the oil with garlic and basil ahead of time for deeper flavor
Grill bread quickly over high heat to prevent burning while achieving char marks
Don't brush oil on until just before grilling to prevent it from burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on creating a flavorful infused oil and managing grill temperature to achieve crispy exteriors with charred flavor without burning the fresh basil.
